title: Ensure course details open from Enroll Now and show full description with INR price in a responsive medium layout

requirements.text: Ensure the Courses page "Enroll Now" action always navigates to the selected course’s full detail view at /courses/$courseId and that the detail view displays the course price formatted in Indian Rupees (INR).

quotes: in courses section there teh enroll  now option when usere click on it then course full detail open and course prise sho in rupees

acceptanceCriteria: From the Courses page, clicking "Enroll Now" on any course opens that course’s detail page (URL matches /courses/<courseId>).
The Course Detail page displays the selected course’s price using INR formatting (₹ and Indian digit grouping), consistent with the Courses list.
If an invalid courseId is visited, a user-friendly "Course Not Found" state is shown with a working "Back to Courses" action.

requirements.text: Update the Course Detail page layout to be fully responsive with a medium-density reading experience and ensure the full course description is always visible (no truncation/clamping or hidden overflow).

quotes: responsive and size midiam and discription show no any one hide

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile and tablet widths, the Course Detail page content stacks cleanly without overlapping or horizontal scrolling.
The course description text on the Course Detail page renders fully without line-clamp, truncation, or hidden overflow (all text remains readable).
Typography and spacing on the Course Detail page feel “medium” density (not oversized like a hero, not cramped like small print), including the description and key metadata blocks.

requirements.text: Ensure the course description shown on the Courses page cards is not visually hidden/truncated and remains readable across responsive breakpoints.

quotes: discription show no any one hide

acceptanceCriteria: On the Courses page, each course card’s description is fully readable (no ellipsis truncation or CSS line-clamp).
The course card layout remains responsive and visually consistent even when descriptions vary in length.
No course card content (price, buttons, metadata) is pushed off-screen or becomes inaccessible due to longer descriptions.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui components are read-only); adjust styling/behavior by composing or via page/component-level classNames only.
Keep backend unchanged (no new Motoko methods or state migrations) since this request is UI behavior/presentation only.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding a real enrollment workflow (forms, payments, confirmations) beyond navigating to the course detail view.
Changing course content copy or creating new courses.
